column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We were coming from a Houston rockets game and everything was closed except Jinya. Being from New York
column2: ramen is something we were really familiar with and have high standards on. The place was pretty busy and smelled amazing. We had the Spicy Chicken ramen
column4: and the octopus balls. The ramen was solid
column5: nothing mind boggling but definitely tasty. The octopus balls I would definitely pass on next time.
